title: What runes will I take as a jungler now?
body: i dont really like electrocute and i feel dark harvest wont be as good now on junglers

replies.body:
Depends on who you play

Tanks - Aftershock/Gaurdian with a side of Domination/Inspiration
Carries - AP - Comet, AD - PTA/Hail of Blades/Conqueror
Farmers - Precision/Domination or Precision/Resolve

Personally, i play a large amount of nocturne (so i completely disagree with your dislike of those two runes) however if i had to choose not using them, i'd go Conqueror or Hail of Blades maybe PTA if i'm feeling like going risky (matchup based)

As for other champs
- if you go Xin, you could go phase rush with resolve secondary
- On eve, you could go Commet, but electrocute is just straight up better
- Something like trundle/yi you could go Conqueror/Resolve

Im sure there are more, but these are the only ones i know/play
It entirely depends on the champ you intend to play
